Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities
pension and other postretirement benefit contributions
proceeds from derivative instrument financing activities
proceeds from payments for other financing activities
proceeds from repayments of other secured financings
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from sale of available for sale securities debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from issuance of preferred stock and preference stock
proceeds from issuance or sale of equity
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock
payments related to common stock repurchase and tax withholding for share based compensation

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments for proceeds from productive assets
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from loans receivable
payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from divestiture of businesses net of cash divested
Purchases of Investments: payments to acquire available for sale securities
payments to acquire available for sale securities debt
payments to acquire loans receivable net of sale
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from maturities prepayments and calls of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale and maturity of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale and maturity of other investments
proceeds from sale of available for sale securities

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in cash and securities segregated under federal and other regulations
increase decrease in financial instruments used in operating activities
increase decrease in payables under repurchase agreements
increase decrease in securities loaned transactions
increase decrease in securities purchased under agreements to resell
Deferred Income Taxes: deferred income taxes and tax credits
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: disposal group not discontinued operation gain loss on disposal
equity method investment realized gain loss on disposal
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
income loss from equity method investments
provision for loan lease and other losses

__unmapped__: effect of cash and cash equivalents related to variable interest entities
financing receivable and off balance sheet credit loss liability credit loss expense reversal
